verses.verse: Lo, <S%H2005><s%> mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> hath <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> this, mine <S%H241>ear<s%> hath <S%H8085>heard<s%> and <S%H995>understood<s%> it.
What ye <S%H1847>know,<s%> the same do <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H1571>also:<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5307>inferior<s%> <S%H4480>unto<s%> you.
Surely <S%H199><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> would <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> and I <S%H2654>desire<s%> to <S%H3198>reason<s%> <S%H413>with<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>
But <S%H199><s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> are <S%H2950>forgers<s%> of <S%H8267>lies,<s%> ye are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7495>physicians<s%> of no <S%H457>value.<s%>
O <S%H4130>that<s%> ye <S%H5414>would<s%> altogether hold your <S%H2790>peace!<s%> <S%H2790><s%> and it should <S%H1961>be<s%> your <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>
Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> my <S%H8433>reasoning,<s%> and <S%H7181>hearken<s%> to the <S%H7379>pleadings<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
Will ye <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H5766>wickedly<s%> for <S%H410>God?<s%> and <S%H1696>talk<s%> <S%H7423>deceitfully<s%> for him?
Will ye <S%H5375>accept<s%> his <S%H6440>person?<s%> will ye <S%H7378>contend<s%> for <S%H410>God?<s%>
Is it <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> he should search you <S%H2713>out?<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H518>or<s%> as one <S%H582>man<s%> <S%H2048>mocketh<s%> another, do ye so <S%H2048>mock<s%> him?
He will surely <S%H3198>reprove<s%> <S%H3198><s%> you, <S%H518>if<s%> ye do <S%H5643>secretly<s%> <S%H5375>accept<s%> <S%H6440>persons.<s%>
Shall <S%H3808>not<s%> his <S%H7613>excellency<s%> make you <S%H1204>afraid?<s%> and his <S%H6343>dread<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you?
Your <S%H2146>remembrances<s%> are <S%H4912>like<s%> unto <S%H665>ashes,<s%> your <S%H1354>bodies<s%> to <S%H1354>bodies<s%> of <S%H2563>clay.<s%>
Hold your <S%H2790>peace,<s%> let me <S%H4480>alone,<s%> that <S%H589>I<s%> may <S%H1696>speak,<s%> and let <S%H5674>come<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> me <S%H4100>what<s%> will.
Wherefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H4100><s%> do I <S%H5375>take<s%> my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in my <S%H8127>teeth,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%> in mine <S%H3709>hand?<s%>
Though <S%H2005><s%> he <S%H6991>slay<s%> me, yet will I <S%H3176>trust<s%> in him: <S%H389>but<s%> I will <S%H3198>maintain<s%> mine own <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him.
He <S%H1931><s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall be my <S%H3444>salvation:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> a <S%H2611>hypocrite<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.
Hear <S%H8085>diligently<s%> <S%H8085><s%> my <S%H4405>speech,<s%> and my <S%H262>declaration<s%> with your <S%H241>ears.<s%>
Behold <S%H2009><s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I have <S%H6186>ordered<s%> my <S%H4941>cause;<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> shall be <S%H6663>justified.<s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> is <S%H1931>he<s%> that will <S%H7378>plead<s%> <S%H5978>with<s%> me? <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> if I hold my <S%H2790>tongue,<s%> I shall give up the <S%H1478>ghost.<s%>
Only <S%H389><s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> things <S%H5978>unto<s%> me: <S%H227>then<s%> will I <S%H3808>not<s%> hide <S%H5641>myself<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee.
Withdraw <S%H7368><s%> thine <S%H3709>hand<s%> far <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> me: and let <S%H408>not<s%> thy <S%H367>dread<s%> make me <S%H1204>afraid.<s%>
Then <S%H7121>call<s%> thou, and <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H6030>answer:<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> let me <S%H1696>speak,<s%> and <S%H7725>answer<s%> thou me.
How <S%H4100><s%> many are mine <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> and <S%H2403>sins?<s%> make me to <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H6588>transgression<s%> and my <S%H2403>sin.<s%>
Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> <S%H5641>hidest<s%> thou thy <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H2803>holdest<s%> me for thine <S%H341>enemy?<s%>
Wilt thou <S%H6206>break<s%> a <S%H5929>leaf<s%> driven to and <S%H5086>fro?<s%> and wilt thou <S%H7291>pursue<s%> the <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H7179>stubble?<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H3789>writest<s%> bitter <S%H4846>things<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, and makest me to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of my <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

Thou <S%H7760>puttest<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> also in the <S%H5465>stocks,<s%> and lookest <S%H8104>narrowly<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H734>paths;<s%> thou settest a <S%H2707>print<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H8328>heels<s%> of my <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
And <S%H1931>he,<s%> as a rotten <S%H7538>thing,<s%> <S%H1086>consumeth,<s%> as a <S%H899>garment<s%> that is <S%H6211>moth<s%> <S%H398>eaten.<s%>
